text: @LincolnLoop can you also send along that Coors magic blizzard train? We need it. Otherwise, save the water for making your crappy beer.

GAE dev server not working for me on Py2.6 (tried 2 diff. comp.). Also doesn't seem to work within a virtualenv, even with 2.5. #googlefail
One week from now I'll be en route to DjangoCon!
The result of itty, classic cinema, good wine, and some quick data scaping: http://bit.ly/the_royal_we. #microframeworksftw #lebowski
I'm excited that our "Selling Django" panel will be able to provide some real compelling success stories and tips for future trail blazers.
Rumor has it DjangoCon is sold out. Cool!
RT @mtrier: This is kind of blowing my mind.  Amazing musical project: http://inbflat.net/ (via @kylefox)
Kevin Dangoor's wishlist for more ideal Python package management:  http://bit.ly/ux1R5
I've gotta say - all the local fires do make for a remarkable sunset. #happyfriday
TGIF home stretch, queuing up some Super Furries. In fact, I'm going to declare it a Super Furry Friday. #ohbehave
LaLa's interface needs a little @mtrythall UX inspiration, but its holding steady as my current favorite music service.
eMusic now has a XUL-based download manager for Linux. Dismal installation handling and documentation. Got it working though.
As a non-Mac user, feeling left out of the buzz of racing to figure out which esoteric new feature I can tell my friends impresses me most.
Forecast says 102 today (39 C). Not expecting any Snow Leopard sightings around here.
Exciting stuff in the works at @lincolnloop around CI and deployment. http://bit.ly/django_startproject http://bit.ly/fabric-factory
@HenrikJoreteg Seems like they'll have a hard time bringing people in on the lower plans. Specs and price just don't seem to match up to me.
RT @HenrikJoreteg: Hmm, interesting: "Django hosting for perfectionists with deadlines."  A dedicated Django host: http://www.kutoken.com
Obama goes biking without a helmet. He must have a good health care plan? Trying to win over libertarians? #graspingforapunchline
Wowza it's hot out there. Might have to opt for the twilight ride.
Fair amount of creaks, squeaks, groans and grinds on the bike. All that fine dust from the Loop wreaking havoc. #weekendproject
@nowells wasn't aware of the --interactive option - looks like a winner!
Overheated the laptop. I'm what's known as a "power user" in hard core, underground computer terminology.
Dealing with encoding issues always manages to take to the wind out of my sails.
i'm at the pizza hut. i'm at the taco bell. i'm at the combination pizza hut and taco bell. #bestlyricsever
Ran into an old friend at the airport that I haven't seen in several years. Had the same flight, so obviously that called for a few rounds.
The kid in front of me on the plane today had a cardboard box full of legos. #sojealous
I have it on good authority that _why is being held hostage by a gang of rogue ponies.
No Daily Show for 3 weeks? #maybeiwillbemoreproductive
Ha! just kidding - removes dummy entry from hosts file I set a few hours ago
This is the 2nd time recently when I've been referening pypi.python.org/simple and it goes down
@shawnr Was he referring to the hip-hop group or the TV show? I'd be ecstatic with either one tbh.
MLM Sex Porn & Money is now following me on Twitter. Finally some recognition. #thingsarelookingup
Either that, or it's the IM equivalent of sex. In, out. In, out. In, out. In, out...
Apparently @HonzaKral's GTalk account has developed a severe case of schizophrenia.
I still feel like I missed out on a part of childhood because the 'rents wouldn't let me have GPK. http://www.strassman.info/gpkids.jpg
Left Handers' Day - y'all better recognize! via @jtauber
@nowells sounds like he has some UX experience working with the mafia
I've started naming my pip reqs. files with a .pip ext. #youhearditherefirst #wherewereyouwhenithappened #crazylikethat
call me a geek, but there is something oddly refreshing about moving a module's pyLint score from 0.82 to 9.74.
python.org web host(s) seems to be down. PyPI still accessible a.t.m.
Pretty excited to be moderating a panel with @pydanny, @shawnr, and Gary Wilson at DjangoCon: Selling Django to Your Superiors
Just whipped up a script to scrobble all my @radioparadise faves to LastFM. Now working on making it available to all RP listeners.
best name for a Python exception nominee: ThingsNobodyCaresAboutButMe  #feedparser
pretty happy with Google Voice so far - nice job out of the gate. the voice-to-text conversion can use a little work
Wife tries to call my GVoice#: "all circuits are busy". Epic win or fail? I'd still be mighty scared of Google right now if I were a telecom
RT @robertlofthouse: Looking for a Django dev that can commit more than 20 hours per week. Interested, let me know. Remote working is fine.
RT @LincolnLoop: While looking for charities, I came across http://www.storyofstuff.com again. If you haven't seen it, please watch
5 flats in the last 2 weeks. Time to get a new tire. via http://twib.es/5VI
forgot what a clusterfuck the Trac installation docs are
FF PyPI search plugin http://ccomb.gorfou.fr/static/pypi/pypi.html #cantlivewithout
Why is so much proprietary software still such a PITA to install on Linux on AMD64? #dumbquestions
followed by despair when you hear people much smarter than you express their frustrations about the state of py pkg. mgmt.  #avoidapt
funny thing: managing implementation+deployment of multiple concurrent projects removes the fear of peeking under the python pkg. mgmt. rug
dove into buildout today - working on a documentation framework for a new cms. some fits and starts; some cringeworthy; some to love.
The Metro developer site is running on Pinax: http://developer.metro.net/. Nice to see Django being used in public sector services.
is it just me, or is the new Firebug crappy?
@mtrythall are you trying to compensate for personal shortcomings with your oversized tab lists?
wish I could have seen this presentation http://jacobian.org/speaking/2009/oscon/
#vanityalert
I suspect an overaggressive network algorithm LinkedIn. @lincolnloop != Lincoln, NE. Nothing against Lincoln, NE. I've never even been there

why does yolk show system packages that aren't available in a virtualenv created with --no-site-packages?  #python #virtualenv
liking the new Manage Music feature in #songbird. just what the doctor ordered.
the bassist for @andrewbird looked like @ericholscher
@mtrythall good luck with the move. it's been said that the worth of a man's consumerism can be measured by the size of his U-Haul.
brainstorming #djangocon proposals. my presentations are so phat you might gain weight.
wow cool - LA Metro developer API: http://developer.metro.net/
I really hope @djangocon can book this guy for the opening night party http://www.vonhummer.com/index.html

99 Luftballoons just came on in the hostel lounge.
toured Beck's brewery today. didn't realize they are such a major player but InBev owns them now. tour was worth it though!
last 2 hostels we've been at have been running Ubuntu on their guest computers
had a great time at the cotton club - real cool little jazz club; listened to a great quartet playing big band and swing standards.
going to check out the red-light district (St. Pauli) in Hamburg. Jen's suggestion not mine :)
spotted @ericholscher in a tour group yesterday in berlin

looking forward to some interesting topics today. plus, a chance to heckle @mtrythall during the @lincolnloop talk. #edc
The Pub was a blast, capped off w/ in depth discussion of joys of defecation around the world w/ @zedshaw @jacobian @lincolnloop #edc
time to dream of ponies and rest up for a serious party tomorrow #djangocon
God/Fate/Luck/Karma/Flying Spaghetti Monster willing, I'll finally be joining @lincolnloop and @mtrythall in Prague today
Pearson International Airport, 3am: hacking away on some code
they found a plane but couldn't find a captain. no flight "tonight". epic FAIL
at least 3 hour delay and it will be a smaller plane so at least 50 won't get on FAIL
i seriously think I found the only plug in this terminal (except for the few that would require sitting in a hall on tile)
power plugs in the seats on Air Canada FTW
at LAX. already had my first surgical mask sighting
no worries time warner, i'm sure there's always high bandwidth use around 4-5am
OH: using the [IE] script debugger is like trying to stab yourself with crayons

Very impressed with Jaunty UNR. Best Ubuntu distro I've used.
welcome to your shiny new netbook Jaunty UNR. the prior tenant had to leave unexpectedly.
No noticeable delay while typing in the update window in Chrome.
it said 'Make Chrome the default browser' and it already checked the box for me. can't argue with that
I never get tired of entering any of ['Google Chrome','Firefox','Safari'] into MSFTs Seach on new Windows installs.
there is a bit of lag while typing in the update window in IE7
giving windows on the new netbook a rare glimpse at the world while jaunty NBR downloads. gotta say though - XP SP3 turned out reasonable
getting along with django-evolutions better by sticking with raw SQL mutations #django #django-evolutions
already remembering why i always missed postgres when i started working with mysql more
trying to work out some postgres cli rust.
w00t picked up a netbook http://snurl.com/gn4t0 for the big trip. a few too many doubts about the EEE and the HP had great reviews
starting my own company now focusing entirely around live search suggestion technology
